text: #GetVaccinated! Will take the #PfizerBioNTech-#vaccine as soon as I am up. Expect my usual reactions (fever, tiredness), but benefits far outweigh this. Vaccines authorized by the EU are safe! If 60-70% are immune, we can put the #COVID19 nightmare behind us. #sciencewillwin https://t.co/OiPgFcadKH
